Fancy a dance?

Why hello there! I am Brian of clan Scaturro - a proud and noble tribe.

I write programs, and read books about writing programs. I spend an inordinate amount of time doing such activities...

I love spending time with my beautiful wife and baby boy in the Grandest of Rapids!

I love Jesus.

Hang out with me on Github or bombard me with @ symbols on Twitter.
